author: New York Post
title: Ground News - Blinken, Mayorkas migrant mission to Mexico yields no action as surge grows
text:
Summary by New York Post The US and Mexico released a joint statement with no details of enforcement action to step a record-breaking wave of illegal immigration -- and teased the prospect of amnesty for those already here unlawfully. Share menu More
